Article Title: IPL 2025: Gujarat Titans give witty reply to Sundar Pichai after Washington Sundar's heroics
Article Text:
Gujarat Titans batter Washington Sundar (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Sai Sudharsan Exclusive Interview: 'The dream is to play Test cricket'

NEW DELHI: Gujarat Titans (GT) had the perfect comeback — both on and off the field — after Washington Sundar 's match-winning performance against Sunrisers Hyderabad .Also See: IPL Live Score, MI vs RCB The IPL franchise dug up an old post from Google CEO Sundar Pichai and responded with a hilarious twist."Sundar came. Sundar conquered,” GT posted on X, replying to Pichai's earlier comment questioning Sundar's absence from the playing XI.Back in March, Pichai had replied to a fan frustrated with Sundar's regular omission from IPL sides, writing, “I have been wondering this too,” with a smiley emoji. On Sunday, Sundar answered the question with his bat.Promoted to No. 4, the all-rounder smashed 49 off 29 balls, including five fours and two sixes, at a strike rate of 168.97. His aggressive knock pulled GT out of early trouble and helped seal a crucial win. He stitched a 90-run stand with captain Shubman Gill after the team lost two early wickets in the powerplay.Sundar later thanked the coaching staff for backing him, calling the promotion a “rare opportunity.”With the internet buzzing, GT's cheeky nod to Pichai proved that Sundar's comeback wasn't just powerful — it was poetic.
Article Summary: Gujarat titans respond to google ceo sundar pichai's comment about washington sundar's omission from ipl xi. The all-rounder smashed 49 off 29 balls, including five fours and two sixes, at a strike rate of 168.97. He stitched a 90-run stand with captain shubman gill.

Article Title: "Tried to break up with her": Dwyane Wade once spoke about wanting to end things with Gabrielle Union as another woman was pregnant with his child
Article Text:
Image via Dia Dipasupil/FilmMagic

Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union's relationship went through a rocky patch before they got engaged

Dwyane Wade on Telling Gabrielle Union He Was Having A Kid With Another Woman | CLUB SHAY SHAY

Dwyane Wade, the NBA legend, recently went through a tough battle against cancer, and his wife, famous actress, Gabrielle Union , stayed by his side all through it. While the two have been married for more than a decade now, there was a time when their relationship had become difficult to manage. In 2023, Dwyane Wade appeared on Shannon Sharpe’s Club Shay Shay podcast and opened up about what happened when he had a child with another woman.According to Dwyane Wade, apparently in 2013, he had hit a rough patch with his now wife, Gabrielle Union, when they were dating. This had caused the couple to take a break in their relationship.It was during their break that Dwyane Wade fathered a son with his long time friend Aja Metoyer. However, things became rocky when Gabrielle Union came back into Dwyane Wade’s life.Dwyane Wade said, "I tried to break up with her, ‘Hey, you know things has been bad lately. We've been having some distance in our relationship anyway.' Like I tried all that. She kept showing up.”But all worked out well for Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union as the two ended up getting engaged in December 2013, one month after his son with Aja Metoyer, Xavier, was born in November 2013.However, it seems like the couple faced some problems in their marriage. Dwyane Wade spoke about his marriage to Gabrielle Union and said, “It hasn’t been perfect, it will never be perfect but that was nine years ago.”He added, “We go to therapy, we’ve had shouts about it, we’ve had regular conversations about, and so it’s been something that going to be something that I have to work at and work on.”When Dwyane Wade spoke about this in 2023, he had not gone through one of the most painful experiences of his life - his cancer diagnosis . It was in December 2023 when he was first tested and later underwent a major kidney surgery.His wife, Gabrielle Union, became a huge source of strength during his battle with cancer and the couple has continued to be very much in love with each other even today. They continue to be one of the most popular couples in the world of sports and entertainment and are pretty happy with their lives as they raise their daughter together.Also Read: "I started feeling invisible": Dwyane Wade’s wife Gabrielle Union opens up about her unsettling Hollywood experiences in new documentary
Article Summary: Dwyane wade and gabrielle union's relationship went through a rocky patch before they got engaged in december 2013. In 2023, dwyane wade appeared on shannon sharpe’s club shay shay podcast and opened up about what happened when he had a child with another woman. He said, “it hasn’t been perfect, it will never be perfect but that was nine years ago”

Article Title: WWE Monday Night RAW preview and streaming details (4/7/25): Full match card, show highlights, how to watch, and more
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE)

WWE Monday Night RAW: Confirmed match card

Lyra Valkyria defends the Women’s Intercontinental Title against Bayley



El Grande Americano journeys to Minneapolis



Seth Rollins returns to Raw



Penta goes head-to-head with Dominik Mysterio





Lyra Valkyria to lock horns with Bayley

Seth Rollins returns to Raw

Penta goes head-to-head with Dominik Mysterio

How to watch WWE Monday Night RAW? (April 7, 2025)

As WrestleMania is just two weeks away, this week’s WWE Monday Night Raw will feature another action-packed night with a surprising storyline, an intense feud, and more. The show will mainly feature the developments that transpired at the previous WWE shows.The April 7, 2025, episode of Monday Night Raw will emanate live from Target Center in Minneapolis, Minnesota, and will be available on Netflix at 8 ET/5 PT and in different timings globally.This week, RAW will deliver some major storyline development as it will feature superstars like Seth Rollins, Lyra Valkyria, CM Punk, Dominik Mysterio, El Grande, and more. It is said that Paul Heyman, along with CM Punk, will also appear tonight in Minneapolis. Let’s take a look at the match preview, streaming details, match card, highlights, and moreLyra Valkyria is all set to lock horns with Bayley in this week’s WWE RAW for the Women's Intercontinental Championship title. Previously, Valkyria has defended her title as Women's Intercontinental Champion by defeating Raquel Rodriguez, Ivy Nile, and Dakota Kai. Now, Bayley is vying for it.In February, The Role Model defeated Valkyria in a non-title match to earn a spot in the Elimination Chamber Match. So, this week, can Bayley repeat his victory over the champion with the title at stake?This week Seth Rollins will return to WWE RAW, after The Visionary had signed the contract of a triple-threat match with CM Punk and Roman Reigns.Despite being in the main event for the second consecutive year, Rollins made it obvious that, for the first time in his career, he does not believe Punk should receive the distinction.Besides, in the segment, CM Punk with WWE’s Wiseman Paul Heyman will also appear on the show. With WrestleMania less than two weeks away, what will they say before their triple-threat match?Meanwhile, Penta will also lock horns with Dominik Mysterio in this week’s RAW. Earlier, according to WWE, Penta gave Dominik Mysterio the gift of knowledge for his birthday by informing "Dirty" Dom on social media this weekend that they will have a one-on-one match that will emanate live today in Minneapolis.-Tonight's WWE Monday Night RAW episode will air live in the United States at 8 PM ET and 5 PM PT on Netflix, while fans in the UK can watch it at 1 AM GMT.-In Canada, the show will be broadcast live every Monday at 8 PM ET on Netflix.-Fans in Ireland can watch the show live at 1 AM GMT every Tuesday on Netflix.-In India, RAW will be available live every Tuesday at 5:30 AM IST on Netflix.Also Read: WWE Elimination Chamber 2025 Results and Highlights: John Cena Wins the Men's Chamber Match and More | WWE News - The Times of India -Viewers in Saudi Arabia can watch the show live at 3 AM AST every Tuesday on Netflix.-In Australia, the show will be broadcast live every Tuesday at 10 AM AEDT on Netflix.-Fans in France can tune in live every Tuesday at 2 AM CET on AB1.
Article Summary: The april 7, 2025, episode of monday night raw will emanate live from target center in minneapolis, minnesota, and will be available on netflix at 8 et/5 pt. This week, raw will deliver some major storyline development as it will feature superstars like seth rollins, lyra valkyria, cm punk, dominik mysterio, el grande, and more.

Article Title: Virat Kohli smashes bat, throws gloves in anger after dismissal vs Mumbai Indians
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (Video grab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli ’s fiery knock against Mumbai Indians ended in frustration on Monday, as the Royal Challengers Bengaluru star batter couldn’t hide his emotions after his dismissal at the Wankhede Stadium .Also See: MI vs RCB Live Score, IPL 2025 Kohli, who was in sublime form, raced to a 29-ball fifty and looked set for a big score. But in the 15th over, just after a time-out, he mistimed a shot off MI skipper Hardik Pandya A top-edge off a leg-side attempt was caught by Naman Dhir at deep square, ending Kohli's innings at 67 off 42 balls, including 8 fours and 2 sixes.As he walked back, an angry Kohli smashed his bat and flung his gloves in the dressing room.Earlier in the innings, Kohli also became the first Indian to breach the 13,000-run mark in T20 cricket and now has 838 runs at the Wankhede — one of his favourite venues.
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru star batter couldn’t hide his emotions after his dismissal at the wankhede stadium. Kohli raced to a 29-ball fifty and looked set for a big score. A top-edge off a leg-side attempt was caught by naman dhir at deep square.

Article Title: IPL match today, MI vs RCB: Playing XI Prediction, head to head, Wankhede Stadium pitch report, weather in Mumbai
Article Text: Mumbai Indians seek consistency as they face Royal Challengers Bengaluru, with a focus on improving batting performances. RCB, bolstered by a strong lineup, aim to exploit MI's vulnerabilities. Weather favours the match, promising a heated contest at the Wankhede Stadium. RCB, on the other hand, will be eyeing this as a chance to capitalise on MI’s vulnerabilities and turn up the pressure even more.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians face royal challengers bengaluru. Weather favours the match, promising a heated contest at the wankhede stadium. Rcb will be eyeing this as a chance to capitalise on mi’s vulnerabilities and turn up the pressure even more.

Article Title: Magic Johnson shared heartfelt message for Samuel L. Jackson, Spike Lee and his fellow NBA legends Charles Barkley and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
Article Text:
Magic Johnson. Image via: Nathan Congleton/NBC via Getty Images

Magic Johnson sends a message for his friends featured in Capital One commercial with him



Capital One NEWEST TV commercial with Samuel L. Jackson, Magic Johnson, Charles Barkley, Spike Lee

The NCAA March Madness commercial breaks have been fun, especially with Magic Johnson , Charles Barkley Spike Lee , and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar . The Hollywood actor-director duo and the basketball legends have delivered a full-blown spectacle, complete with blimps, cowboy hats, and one unforgettable genie. Recently, Johnson took to his social media to share a heartfelt message for his friends in the ads in a heartfelt post.Magic Johnson captured the spirit of the weekend with heartfelt gratitude and behind-the-scenes excitement, “Another successful Final Four in San Antonio, TX with my incredible partners at Capital One! I had so much fun shooting this year’s commercials with my friends Samuel L. Jackson, Charles Barkley, Spike Lee and my forever captain and Showtime Laker teammate Kareem Abdul-Jabbar. It was so cool seeing the Magic Blimp flying over San Antonio and the mini blimp in the Alamodome. Thank you to the entire Capital One Team for having me this weekend!"This year’s Capital One campaign raised the bar with what can only be described as a March Madness cinematic universe. Themed “Battle of the Blimps,” the campaign launched actual blimps featuring the likenesses of Johnson and Barkley floating over San Antonio, hyping up fans with a tongue-in-cheek challenge: “Find out who is the baddest blimp of all… and who is just full of hot air.”It was the kind of ad campaign that hooked fans during the men’s and women’s tournaments. From over-the-top skits to heartwarming nostalgia, they were funny, oddly comforting, and undeniably memorable. Whether it was Barkley in his hilariously named "Chuxedo," Jackson channeling pure joy with every line, or Spike Lee just trying to hold it together, these commercials felt like comfort food.And then came the genie moment. Magic Johnson, the NBA legend and business mogul, turned into a literal wish-granting genie on screen.These commercials have gained wide attention even online. Fans have showered praised for the funny and well-cfafted commercials featuring the Hollywood and the NBA legends.As for the March Madness women’s tournament, The UConn Huskies clamied another national title in dominant fashion. On Sunday, they rolled past top-seeded South Carolina with an 82-58 victory. It was head coach Geno Auriemma’s 12th NCAA women’s basketball championship.Also Read: Paige Bueckers earns high praise from Barack Obama and Gordon Ramsay after NCAA championship Men's March Madness final will feature a high octane showdown between Florida Gators and Houston Cougars on Monday, April 7 at 8:50 p.m. ET.
Article Summary: The ncaa march madness commercial breaks have been fun, especially with magic johnson, charles barkley, spike lee and kareem abdul-jabbar. Johnson took to his social media to share a heartfelt message for his friends in the ads. The uconn huskies clamied another national title in dominant fashion.

Article Title: Who won yesterday's IPL match, MI vs RCB: Yesterday IPL match result
Article Text:
RCB players (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Brief scores:

Royal Challengers Bengaluru:

Mumbai Indians:

NEW DELHI: Royal Challengers Bengaluru ended their decade-long winless run at the Wankhede Stadium with a thrilling 12-run victory over Mumbai Indians in a high-scoring IPL 2025 clash on Monday. The win was RCB’s first at the iconic venue since 2015.Batting first, RCB posted an imposing 221/5, riding on brisk half-centuries from captain Rajat Patidar (64 off 32) and Virat Kohli (67 off 42). Jitesh Sharma provided the late flourish with a 19-ball 40, helping RCB finish strong.In reply, Mumbai Indians were restricted to 209/9 despite a fierce 89-run stand between Tilak Varma (56 off 29) and skipper Hardik Pandya (42 off 15). MI stayed in the hunt until the final over, needing 19 runs, but Krunal Pandya (4/45) held his nerve to claim three wickets and seal a famous win for the visitors.Patidar was named Player of the Match and credited RCB’s bowlers for holding their composure on a batting-friendly pitch. Hardik admitted MI fell just short and praised Bumrah’s efforts with the ball.The result lifts RCB into the top three in the points table, while MI continue to struggle with four losses in five games, now placed eighth.221/5 in 20 overs (Rajat Patidar 64, Virat Kohli 67, Devdutt Padikkal 37, Jitesh Sharma 40 not out; Hardik Pandya 2/45).209/9 in 20 overs (Tilak Varma 56, Hardik Pandya 42; Krunal Pandya 4/45).
Article Summary: Royal challengers bengaluru beat mumbai indians by 12 runs. Victory was rcb's first at the wankhede stadium since 2015. Rajat patidar (64) and virat kohli (67) top scored for rcb. Mi were restricted to 209/9 in their 20 overs.

Article Title: Rishabh Pant: IPL 2025: 'There is no change... as always, Rishabh Pant is chilled and relaxed'
Article Text:
Lucknow Super Giants captain Rishabh Pant (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll What do you think is the main reason for Rishabh Pant's poor performance so far? Poor shot selections Bad luck Lack of form Pressure of being captain

NEW DELHI: Despite Rishabh Pant 's dismal start to IPL 2025, Lucknow Super Giants all-rounder Shahbaz Ahmed remains unfazed by the captain's poor form with the bat.Also See: MI vs RCB Live Score, IPL 2025 Pant, bought for a record Rs 27 crore, has managed just 19 runs from four innings, averaging 4.75 with a strike rate of 59.37. But Shahbaz is confident the southpaw will deliver when it matters most."There is no change in his mood. As always, he is chilled and relaxed," Shahbaz said ahead of LSG's clash against Kolkata Knight Riders at Eden Gardens . "He is working very hard on his batting, and we believe that when crunch time comes, Rishabh Pant will score runs and win matches for us."Shahbaz also weighed in on the Eden pitch, which has been under scrutiny after KKR's opening loss. As a Bengal player familiar with local conditions, he expects the surface to assist spinners."This wicket looks slower. I don't think it will turn much, but the ball may stop a bit," he noted. "It's not surprising they've prepared a spin-friendly wicket with Narine and Varun in their side."LSG will hope Pant finds his touch soon — preferably on a pitch that promises a close contest.
Article Summary: Rishabh pant has managed just 19 runs from four innings in ipl 2025. Shahbaz ahmed remains unfazed by the captain's poor form with the bat. The all-rounder is confident pant will deliver when it matters most.

Article Title: How Virat Kohli, Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma fared in MI vs RCB IPL clash
Article Text:
Virat Kohli, Jasprit Bumrah and Hardik Pandya

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

When will CSK legend MS Dhoni retire from IPL? Astrologer Greenstone Lobo predicts

As Mumbai Indians (MI) host Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in a high-octane IPL 2025 encounter at the Wankhede Stadium today, all eyes will be on the mouth-watering individual battles — particularly Virat Kohli vs Jasprit Bumrah , and the long-standing rivalry between India’s modern-day batting icons, Kohli and Rohit Sharma Also See: MI vs RCB, IPL Live Score While MI vs RCB is a marquee clash in itself, the showdown between Kohli and Bumrah has become one of the most anticipated match-ups in T20 cricket.Bumrah has dismissed Kohli five times in 16 IPL innings — an impressive record — but Kohli has scored 140 runs off just 95 balls against the ace pacer, at a strike rate of 147.36, hitting 15 fours and five sixes. The contest remains even, with both players exchanging blows in different seasons, making it one of IPL’s most compelling duels.Kohli, in his 18th consecutive season for RCB, has started IPL 2025 strong, scoring 97 runs in three matches at a strike rate of over 134. Bumrah, returning from a back injury sustained during the Border-Gavaskar Trophy earlier this year, will be eager to make a statement in front of his home crowd.Meanwhile, the Kohli vs Rohit narrative adds another layer of drama. Kohli boasts 27,599 international runs to Rohit's 19,700, but in the IPL, Rohit has the silverware edge — five titles to Kohli's none. Against MI, Kohli has scored 855 runs with a top score of 92, while Rohit has 831 runs vs RCB, including a best of 94.At the Wankhede, the numbers lean in MI’s favour. RCB haven’t won here since 2015, losing six in a row. Kohli has 301 runs at the venue against MI at an average of 43, while Rohit has piled up 307 against RCB at an average of 43.86 and a strike rate of over 154.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians (mi) host royal challengers bengaluru (rcb) in a high-octane ipl 2025 encounter at the wankhede stadium today. All eyes will be on the mouth-watering individual battles — particularly virat kohli vs jasprit bumrah and the long-standing rivalry between india’s modern-day batting icons, kohli and rohit sharma.

Article Title: 'Even the tomato seller knows better than Pakistan cricket board': Basit Ali lambasts PCB after recent woes
Article Text:
Pakistan cricket (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Do you agree with Basit Ali's call for the resignation of the selection committee? No, they should stay. Yes, they should resign.

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Former cricketer Basit Ali has called for the resignation of Pakistan's selection committee in the wake of the national team's disappointing performance, culminating in a 3-0 clean sweep loss to New Zealand in a recent One Day International (ODI) series.This call for change comes amid a period of underwhelming performances by the Pakistani cricket team, notably since their exit from the Champions Trophy at the group stage, an event they previously won.Also See: MI vs RCB, IPL Live Score Basit Ali, expressing his dissatisfaction with the selection committee's decisions, suggested that the committee, which includes Aleem Dar, Aqib Javed, Asad Shafiq, Azhar Ali, and Hassan Cheema, lacks expertise in team formation.He highlighted the committee's failure to include spinners in the Champions Trophy squad as a critical oversight."The selection committee should resign. They don't know how to make teams. From the Champions Trophy until now, it has been a flop show. Even the tomato seller was asking why you didn't include spinners in the Champions Trophy. Aqib should step down. If you stay for four months, you will lose against Bangladesh as well," Basit said on his YouTube channel, as quoted by ANI.In an effort to rebuild and focus on future competitions, including the 2026 T20 World Cup and the 2027 ODI World Cup, Pakistan embarked on a tour of New Zealand, which included five Twenty20 Internationals (T20Is) and three ODIs.For the T20I series against New Zealand, Pakistan opted for a younger, less experienced squad, excluding key players such as Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan.Despite the infusion of new talent, Pakistan was defeated 4-1 by a relatively young New Zealand team led by Michael Bracewell.The subsequent ODI series, aimed at preparing for the 2027 World Cup, also ended in disappointment for Pakistan, even with the return of Azam and Rizwan to the lineup.Additionally, Basit proposed that the Pakistan Cricket Board ( PCB ) Chairman, Mohsin Naqvi, should consider organising a T10 cricket tournament."PCB chairman should host a T10 tournament. Babar, Rizwan, Imam-ul-Haq, Salman Agha, Tayyab Tahir , and Abdullah Shafique need to learn power hitting," he added.
Article Summary: Former cricketer basit ali has called for the resignation of pakistan's selection committee. He suggested that the committee lacks expertise in team formation. The call for change comes amid a period of underwhelming performances by the pakistani cricket team, notably since their exit from the champions trophy.

Gujarat Titans pacer Mohammed Siraj has climbed to joint-second place in the IPL Purple Cap race for IPL 2025. Siraj has been in exceptional form this season, claiming crucial wickets and providing early breakthroughs for his team. He has taken nine wickets in four matches, with his best figures being 4/17. In his last match, Siraj dismantled Sunrisers Hyderabad's explosive batting lineup by taking the wickets of Abhishek Sharma, Travis Head, Simranjeet Singh and Aniket Verma.Siraj has proven his worth for the Gujarat Titans' bid to acquire him in the auction. Bowling with improved line and length, and at a high speed, Siraj poses a significant challenge to batters in the season ahead.Chennai Super Kings’ mystery spinner Noor Ahmed continues to lead in the Purple Cap leaderboard. Despite his team's struggles to win matches, Noor has been outstanding, maintaining his position at the top. Delhi Capitals’ Mitchell Starc is level with Siraj with nine wickets in three matches. His excellent bowling form has been instrumental in DC's strong position at the top of the IPL points table.Gujarat Titans’ Sai Kishore is also providing tough competition for the Purple Cap contenders. With his exemplary spin skills, he has taken eight wickets at an impressive economy rate of 7.06. He is leading the spin department for Gujarat Titans, claiming crucial wickets this season.Pooran remains on top of the orange cap listLSG’s Nicholas Pooran continues to lead the Orange Cap race in IPL 2025. The explosive batter has scored 201 runs in four matches, maintaining a strike rate of 218.47. His consistent power-hitting, which includes 16 sixes, has made him one of the most formidable batters of the tournament so far.Close behind him in second place is Gujarat Titans’ Sai Sudharsan, who has scored 191 runs in four innings, with an impressive average of 47.75. His smart shot selection and consistent scoring have been key to keeping GT competitive this season.In third place is Mitchell Marsh of LSG, who has scored 184 runs at a strike rate of 185.85. Marsh has displayed great form, registering three half-centuries in four matches.Mumbai Indians’ Surya Kumar Yadav remains in fourth with 171 runs and boasts the best average among the top four at 57.00. Rounding out the top five is Jos Buttler of Gujarat Titans, with 166 runs in four matches, including his highest score of an unbeaten 73.
Article Summary: Cnn.com will feature ireporter photos in a weekly travel snapshots gallery. Please submit your best shots of the u.s. for next week. Visit cnn.com/travel next friday for a new gallery of snapshots from around the world. Mohammed siraj has climbed to joint-second place in the ipl 2025 purple cap race for ipl 25.

Article Title: Jasprit Bumrah returns after 93 days: Mumbai Indians seamer named in playing XI vs Royal Challengers Bengaluru
Article Text: Jasprit Bumrah has been named in the playing XI for MI vs RCB in IPL 2025, just as it was confirmed a day prior by the team head coach Mahela Jayawardene. Bumrah will take the field after more than three months due to an injury layoff. His return is a huge boost to MI, especially after their disappointing start with three losses in four matches this season.
Article Summary: Jasprit bumrah will take the field after more than three months due to an injury layoff. His return is a huge boost to mi, especially after their disappointing start with three losses in four matches this season. Mi vs rcb: team news, probable line-ups and more.

Article Title: 'I don't cry that easily': Shreyas Iyer reveals the last time he couldn't stop himself
Article Text:
Shreyas Iyer (Screengrab)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

NEW DELHI: India's middle-order batter and Punjab Kings skipper Shreyas Iyer experienced an emotional moment during the first practice session of the Champions Trophy 2025, where he found himself in tears due to his inability to perform as expected.Despite coming off a successful series against England, Iyer struggled with his form in the nets, leading to a rare display of vulnerability. This incident marked a significant moment for Iyer, who admitted to rarely crying.Also See: IPL Live Score, MI vs RCB "Last time I cried was during Champions Trophy, first practice session. Like literally crying, crying. Because I batted in the nets, and it didn't go well. I was so angry with myself that I started crying. And I was also shocked at the fact that I don't cry that easily," Shreyas Iyer said on Punjab Kings' show.However, his resilience and ability to quickly understand the playing conditions paid off, as he became a crucial player for India throughout the Champions Trophy. His contribution was particularly notable in the finals, where he scored 48 runs off 62 balls, helping his team in the middle overs.Under Iyer's captaincy, Punjab Kings suffered a heavy 50-run defeat at the hands of Rajasthan Royals in Mullanpur, as their IPL 2025 campaign tasted its first defeat.Chasing a daunting 206, PBKS faltered early with both openers, including captain Shreyas Iyer, dismissed inside the powerplay by a fiery Jofra Archer.Archer finished with 3/25, setting the tone for Rajasthan’s commanding bowling performance.Earlier, Yashasvi Jaiswal starred with the bat, scoring a fluent 67 off 45 balls, supported by Sanju Samson (38) and a late flourish from Riyan Parag (43 not out). Their efforts propelled RR to a formidable 205/4. Despite some resistance in the middle order, PBKS couldn’t recover from early blows and ended at 155/9.The loss raises concerns for Punjab, particularly around their top-order fragility and captain Iyer’s underwhelming form, while Rajasthan Royals regained much-needed momentum and a healthy net run rate boost with the victory.
Article Summary: Shreyas iyer found himself in tears during the first practice session of the champions trophy 2025. Iyer struggled with his form in the nets, leading to a rare display of vulnerability. Punjab kings suffered a heavy 50-run defeat at the hands of rajasthan royals.

Article Title: 'Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma give us added fuel': Hardik Pandya as MI opt to field vs RCB
Article Text:
File Pic: Hardik Pandya, Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Who do you think will have a bigger impact on the match, Bumrah or Rohit? Neither Both equally Rohit Sharma Jasprit Bumrah

MI vs RCB Playing XIs:

Mumbai Indians XI:

Royal Challengers Bengaluru XI:

NEW DELHI: It was a moment of joy for Mumbai Indians fans even before the first delivery at the Wankhede Stadium on Monday, as skipper Hardik Pandya revealed at the toss that both Jasprit Bumrah and Rohit Sharma were returning to the playing XI for the high-stakes IPL 2025 clash against Royal Challengers Bengaluru .Also See: MI vs RCB, IPL Live Score “Jassi (Bumrah) is back and so is Ro (Rohit). Both of our experienced campaigners are back in the side, that gives us an added fuel,” Hardik said, choosing to bowl first after winning the toss.Bumrah’s return marks a major boost for Mumbai, as the ace pacer makes his comeback to professional cricket after a three-month injury layoff. He last featured in India’s fifth Test against Australia in Sydney, where he picked up 32 wickets across the series before being sidelined.MI head coach Mahela Jayawardene had earlier confirmed Bumrah’s readiness after he cleared all fitness protocols at the BCCI’s Centre of Excellence in Bengaluru.Hardik added, “This looks like a good track, dew might come in later. It’s time for us to get some rhythm, take smarter options and do the right things. We’re playing good cricket, but missing key moments. If we fix those, we’ll be in rhythm. Mumbai has always supported us - this is our fortress.”RCB skipper Rajat Patidar, leading an unchanged XI, said it was a “typical Mumbai wicket” and backed his bowlers to handle the challenge.Will Jacks, Ryan Rickelton(w), Suryakumar Yadav, Tilak Varma, Hardik Pandya(c), Naman Dhir, Mitchell Santner, Deepak Chahar, Trent Boult, Jasprit Bumrah, Vignesh PuthurPhilip Salt, Virat Kohli, Devdutt Padikkal, Rajat Patidar(c), Liam Livingstone, Jitesh Sharma(w), Tim David, Krunal Pandya, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Josh Hazlewood, Yash Dayal
Article Summary: Jasprit bumrah makes his comeback to professional cricket after a three-month injury layoff. Mi skipper hardik pandya chose to bowl first after winning the toss. Rcb skipper rajat patidar said it was a ‘typical mumbai wicket’

Article Title: Virat Kohli takes on Jasprit Bumrah, hits a six off first ball. Watch!
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (Pic credit: X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

WATCH:

NEW DELHI: Virat Kohli vs Jasprit Bumrah – one of IPL ’s most electrifying rivalries – delivered fireworks yet again at the Wankhede Stadium on Monday.Making a comeback after a 93-day injury layoff, Bumrah returned with serious pace, clocking over 140 kmph in his opening over for Mumbai Indians against Royal Challengers Bengaluru. But Kohli wasted no time in asserting dominance.Facing Bumrah for the first time in IPL 2025, Kohli launched the second ball of the fourth over over deep mid-wicket for a towering six – his first of the match and a powerful statement in their ongoing duel.Despite the early blow, Bumrah kept it tight, conceding just 10 runs in the over with figures of 1 6 1 1 0 1.Before the match, Bumrah had dismissed Kohli five times in 16 IPL innings, but Kohli’s aggressive strike rate of 147.36 against the pacer keeps the battle perfectly poised.
Article Summary: Virat kohli hits towering six off jasprit bumrah's first over in ipl 2025. Mumbai indians take on royal challengers bengaluru at the wankhede stadium. Pacer makes comeback after 93-day injury layoff for mumbai indians.

Article Title: BOWLED! Rohit Sharma's flop show continues in IPL 2025 with another early exit. Watch
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma is clean bowled by RCB pacer Yash Dayal. (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

WATCH Rohit Sharma's dismissal today:

NEW DELHI: India captain and Mumbai Indians opener Rohit Sharma's lean patch in IPL 2025 persisted as he was dismissed for just 17 against Royal Challengers Bengaluru at the Wankhede Stadium on Monday.Chasing a daunting 222, Rohit showed brief promise, cracking a six off Bhuvneshwar Kumar in the first over and following it up with two successive boundaries off Yash Dayal. However, the fourth delivery from Dayal — a sharp inswinger — sneaked past Rohit’s bat and crashed into his leg stump.It marked his highest score of the season so far, after three disappointing outings earlier: 0 vs CSK, 8 vs GT, and 13 vs KKR. Rohit, who missed MI’s previous match due to a minor injury, has now scored just 38 runs in four innings.His recurring struggles against left-arm pace also came to the fore — this being the 12th time since 2024 he’s fallen to a left-arm pacer in T20s.Earlier in the evening, RCB posted 221/5 thanks to fifties from Virat Kohli (67) and Rajat Patidar (64). Rohit's early dismissal was a major blow to MI's chase, continuing a worrisome trend for the veteran opener and raising concerns for the Mumbai-based franchise.
Article Summary: Rohit sharma dismissed for just 17 against royal challengers bengaluru. India captain has now scored just 38 runs in four innings. Virat kohli (67) and rajat patidar (64) posted fifties for rcb.

Article Title: Travis Kelce Vs Rob Gronkowski: NFL fans explode over Travis Kelce vs. Rob Gronkowski debate: who’s the real tight end GOAT?
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Team Gronk

Team Kelce

Travis Kelce vs. Rob Gronkowski: A simple debate post turned into pure chaos, with fans flooding X with stats, jokes, and Swiftie warnings



"It's kelce. Gronk missed almost 40 games in New England."

"Not even close. Gronk. Kelce isn’t a TE. He’s a receiver positioned in the TE slot."

"IDC about the numbers, Travis Kelce never was and never will be a better FOOTBALL PLAYER than Rob Gronkowski. Let’s end this today lol. The film don’t lie. Kelce hands are covered in doo doo butter, all Gronk did was make men look like kids weekly."

the

So who’s really ahead: let’s break down the numbers and see which tight end is leading the legacy game



Rob Gronkowski – The powerhouse who bullied defenses

Super Bowl wins:

Career receiving yards:

Touchdowns:

Pro Bowls:

Blocking:

Record highlights:

Holds the most combined receptions (23) and receiving yards (297) by a tight end in Super Bowl history

First tight end ever to lead the league in receiving touchdowns (17 in 2011)

Patriots’ all-time leader in receiving touchdowns (79)

Travis Kelce – The route-running king rewriting records

Super Bowl wins:

Career receiving yards:

Touchdowns:

Pro Bowls:

Consistency:

Record highlights:

Most career receptions in Super Bowl history (35), surpassing even Jerry Rice

Known for elite route running and separation ability that’s helped power the Chiefs’ dynasty

The verdict: Two legends, two different legacies



NFL fans are usually divided on teams, but now the trenches have shifted to the tight end position. One simple question—Travis Kelce or Rob Gronkowski? This has snowballed into a full-blown civil war. Every corner of the football internet is sounding off, and no one seems willing to back down. Whether it’s about stats, rings, blocking, or even Taylor Swift, the lines have been drawn.Forget team rivalries—this is nowvs., and it’s getting personal.It all started with a viral post that reignited the age-old question: who’s better—Rob Gronkowski or Travis Kelce? From there, the comment section became pure mayhem.People brought receipts, emotions, and even their inner Swiftie energy:"I’m surprised the Swifties weren’t barking in this comment section."Yes, that was a real post. Yes, this is how deep the internet is in.Some fans argued Gronk was a once-in-a-generation force who bulldozed defenses and made blocking an art form. Others said Kelce’s route running, longevity, and chemistry with Mahomes make himguy of the modern era.And then came the wildcards—shoutouts to Tony Gonzalez, Jay Novacek, and even “15K yards > rings” energy. It’s safe to say the post opened Pandora’s box.With all the noise online, let’s get into the facts.4 rings (XLIX, LI, LIII, LV)9,28692 career TDs5-time selectionWidely respected as one of the best blocking tight ends everGronk was the total package—physical, explosive, and nearly impossible to cover or stop once the ball was in his hands. He played with unmatched intensity and was just as dangerous in the run game as he was through the air.3 rings (LIV, LVII, LVIII)Over 11,000 and still climbing74 (and counting)10-time selectionNine straight 1,000-yard seasons (an NFL record for tight ends)Kelce is still going strong in 2025, and his combination of finesse, football IQ, and consistency make him one of the most productive offensive weapons ever—tight end or not.Gronk was a brute-force nightmare who did it all—receiving, blocking, and dominating physically. Kelce is a surgical route technician whose longevity and production have set new standards for the position.Gronk's legacy is already sealed, but Kelce’s still-unfolding career is giving fans every reason to believe he could finish as the most statistically dominant tight end in NFL history.Also read - Erin Andrews and Charissa Thompson tease a wild new podcast chapter after FOX exit So who's the GOAT? Depends what you're looking for—the physical force of nature or the unstoppable technician.
Article Summary: Travis kelce or rob gronkowski? This has snowballed into a full-blown civil war. A simple debate post turned into pure chaos, with fans flooding x with stats, jokes, and swiftie warnings. "not even close. Kelce isn’t a te. He’s a receiver positioned in the te slot," one fan wrote.

Article Title: “I know I’ll come back!”: WWE star Kevin Owens shares major injury recovery update
Article Text:
(Image Via WWE)

Kevin Owens reveals major recovery update regarding his injury

My Mom’s Basement show

Robbie Fox.

Kevin Owens On Missing WrestleMania, Getting Neck Surgery

Kevin Owens forced to bow out of WrestleMania due to neck injury: SmackDown highlights April 4, 2025

Also Read

As WWE star Kevin Owens has recently announced on last week’s SmackDown that he will not be joining the WrestleMania match against Randy Orton owing to his serious neck injury, fans have been quite upset as they won’t be able to witness Owens’ bout against the Viper.It has come to light that the WWE champion has been dealing with this injury for approximately four months and now requires surgery, leading to the cancellation of the match.Now, Kevin Owens has come out with a major recovery update about his serious neck injury, which he admitted that needs treatment and surgery, during a segment on the last Friday Smackdown edition of April 4, 2025.Let’s take a look at the major recovery update that Kevin Owens has for the WWE Universe.In a major update on his injury status, Kevin Owens provided an early recovery time ahead of having his neck surgery. Though his return to the WWE ring seems uncertain, WWE champion revealed that he fully intends to return to the ring.The wrestler shared his recovery update while speaking onwithHe stated in the interview that he knows people who have experienced same injury and have been out of work for six months to a year.Speaking about his injury update, Owens said, “I know I’ll come back — or at the very least, I really hope I come back. You know, I guess there’s … I never take anything for granted in what we do, so who knows? But it’s pretty likely I’ll come back. And then, maybe we could do it eventually.”He further added to the interview, “I haven’t talked to the surgeon or anything like that yet. I’m going to do all that on Monday. I mean, I know that most of the people who have gone through similar things have probably, you know, six months to eight months to a year. So I would assume within that range, but I don’t really know. Like I said, it’s all really new right now.”Earlier on SmackDown, an emotional Kevin Owens thanked his fans for their unwavering support, when he announced that he won’t be able to participate this year on the Show of Shows.Previously, Owens was last seen in the Elimination Chambers PLE on March 1, 2025, in an Unsanctioned Match against his former best friend, Sami Zayn. During the Elimination Chambers match, Sami Zayn was defeated by Kevin Owens, after brutally thrashing the former inside the ring.On the segment, Randy Orton made a shocking comeback to save Sami Zayn and attacked Kevin Owens brutally. This intense feud led to the company fixing an anticipated clash at the upcoming Shows of the Show on April 19, 2025, and April 20, 2025, in Las Vegas, Nevada.However, now it has been officially confirmed by WWE that the match won’t take place due to Owens’ injury, and later a match would be set up after his recovery to settle down the difference between Owens and Randy Orton.
Article Summary: Wwe star kevin owens has come out with a major recovery update about his serious neck injury, which he admitted that needs treatment and surgery. The wwe champion has been dealing with this injury for approximately four months and now requires surgery, leading to the cancellation of the match.

Article Title: “They take good at-bats”- Teoscar Hernandez reflects on the Dodgers series loss against Phillies
Article Text:
“They take good at-bats”- Teoscar Hernandez reflects on the Dodgers series loss against Phillies (Image Source: Instagram)

Dodgers’ star Teoscar Hernandez on the Philadelphia Phillies great performance

“They play really good baseball; they take good at-bats today and a lot of walks that can close pitches.”

Dodgers Postgame: Teoscar Hernández on Big Night at the Plate, Adjustments vs Sánchez, Team Fight

“We know the team that we have; especially from last year, we know we can get back into the game easily.“

The Los Angeles made headlines, created a new record for the franchise, and Shohei Ohtani went on to become the first baseball star to join the Fortnite Icon Series. Well, the Dodgers were in the limelight for all the good reasons during the first leg of the 2025 MLB season. The Dodgers were treading carefully with respect to their unbeaten streak of 9-0 but unfortunately lost a three-game series against the Philadelphia Phillies .Dodgers talented outfielder Teoscar Hernandez reflected on their loss and even praised the Phillies for their great performance.Almost a week ago, the Los Angeles Dodgers’ talented players made headlines for a remarkable franchise record with 9-0 during the ongoing major league season. Recently, the Dodgers came tumbling down after losing a three-game series against the Philadelphia Phillies, transforming the 9-0 record to 9-2. Their unbeaten winning streak was broken by the Phillies as they went on to divert the attention of the MLB athletes’ after defeating the Los Angeles Dodgers .After the loss of the Dodgers, Dominican athlete Teoscar Hernandez openly spoke about the Phillies and even praised them for their tremendous performance. During a post-game interview with The Dodgers Bleed Los Podcast Network , Teoscar Hernandez not only spoke about the noteworthy performance of the Philadelphia Phillies but also shared his confident side for the upcoming games. He said-Teoscar Hernandez spoke confidently about the Dodgers’ approach for the upcoming games. He said-From shortstop Mookie Betts , who was reportedly not well during the Dodgers’ clash with the Chicago Cubs in Tokyo, to designated hitter Shohei Ohtani’s spellbinding home runs that enthralled MLB fans across the globe, the Dodgers have one of the best starting lineups. The loss against the Philadelphia Phillies came as an unexpected blow for the Los Angeles Dodgers after they witnessed one of the best starts to the 2025 MLB season.Also Read: Los Angeles Dodgers vs. Washington Nationals- Where and how to watch today’s match, expected lineup, venue, time and more
Article Summary: The los angeles dodgers made headlines for a remarkable franchise record with 9-0 during the ongoing major league season. Recently, the dodgers came tumbling down after losing a three-game series against the philadelphia phillies. The dodgers talented outfielder teoscar hernandez reflected on their loss and even praised the phillies for their great performance.

Article Title: New York Yankees’ star Aaron Judge matches MLB Legend Babe Ruth's home run record
Article Text:
New York Yankees’ star Aaron Judge matches MLB Legend Babe Ruth home run record (Image Source: Getty)

Is Aaron Judge making history for the Yankees?

Aaron Judge donnes a flashy new look

Aaron Judge necklace

“He always had the little gold, small little gold chain, I had to let him know: ‘Hey, you’re the best player in the world, my guy. You’ve got to do something. You’ve got to show something. You got it.’”

“But I like it. I love it, actually. Show other kids that baseball is changing and he’s along with it. The best player in the world is with it.”

Yankees’ manager Aaron Boone praises Aaron Judge

The New York Yankees’ captain, Aaron Judge, is currently one of the best hitters in the baseball industry right now, and there’s no doubt about that. Not only is Judge off to a brilliant performance of his career, but he’s also off to a stunning season for the New York Yankees . Aaron Judge has managed to secure at least two hits and has already hit six home runs and has 18 RBIs.Aaron Judge isn’t just playing baseball. He is creating history for the New York Yankees. He is limitless and is only going to move upwards.As per MLB.com, Aaron Judge has recently been able to match MLB’s legend Babe Ruth’s 321 home runs through 1,000 with a team’s score. Judge managed to secure 157 homers in just the last three years. He had 62 homers in 2022, 37 long balls in 2023, and 58 homers last year.Meanwhile, Aaron Judge is a known name in the baseball industry. While he has been the face of the New York Yankees for over 10 years now, this week his fans found a new addition to his game day look.A diamond-encrusted gavel, hanging from a chain.Aaron Judge told YES Network that the necklace was a gift.Jazz Chisholm Jr. too was all in awe of the now-viralChisholm told The Athletic:Further he said:The New York Yankees’ manager Aaron Boone also praised Aaron Judge and claimed that he will be inducted into the Hall of Famer. He said:“I mean, I think it’s a no-brainer [that Judge will be inducted into the HOF.”Also Read: How Many Home Runs Will Aaron Judge Hit This Season? Latest Projections After Hot Start
Article Summary: New york yankees’ star aaron judge matches mlb legend babe ruth home run record. Aaron judge has been the face of the new york yankees for over 10 years now. This week his fans found a new addition to his game day look. A diamond-encrusted gavel, hanging from a chain.
